import pandas as pd
import geopandas as gpd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# 假设csv文件路径为 'occurrences.csv'
csv_file = r'E:\科研\NUS\occurrence data\蚀虫出现数据\doi_10_5061_dryad_47v3c__v20170216\albopictus_corrected.csv'

# 读取csv文件
df = pd.read_csv(csv_file)

# 创建GeoDataFrame
gdf = gpd.GeoDataFrame(df, geometry=gpd.points_from_xy(df['X'], df['Y']))

# 设置坐标系为WGS84
gdf.crs = 'EPSG:4326'

# 绘制地图
world = gpd.read_file(gpd.datasets.get_path('naturalearth_lowres'))
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 6))
world.boundary.plot(ax=ax, linewidth=1)
gdf.plot(ax=ax, color='black', marker='o', markersize=1)

# 添加标题和标签
plt.title('Global Distribution of Aedes Occurrences')
plt.xlabel('Longitude')
plt.ylabel('Latitude')

# 显示地图
plt.show()
